Scheduling

Welcome to Dr. Kolli’s online scheduler. It is a fast, reliable, and convenient way for patients to schedule initial and follow-up appointments any time of the day.
If you are thinking of becoming a NEW patient:

  • Please call Dr. Kolli first to determine suitability for the practice. The number is (732) 655-4568
  • Schedule an appointment for either an Adult Evaluation or a Child/Adolescent Evaluation. All patients new to the private practice must have an evaluation, even if you were seen by Dr. Kolli in another facility.
  • Payment (via credit card or paypal) is requested at the time of scheduling. By inputting the credit card information you are authorizing payment but the money will not be transferred until 48hrs prior to the appointment.
  • Once your appointment has been confirmed, you will receive an email from Dr. Kolli a few days prior to your appointment. In it you will find your own unique user name and password to log on to your eRecord and fill out initial forms.

If you are an ESTABLISHED patient, there are three follow-up options:

  • 20 minute follow-up appt: brief medication management appointments appropriate for patients that are stable on their medications.
  • 40 minute follow-up appt: appropriate for complex medication management, brief therapy, or psychoeducational sessions.
  • 60 minute follow-up appt: therapy, with or without medications.

If you need to CANCEL or AMEND an appointment:

  • Click on the link on the bottom of the page provided in your booking confirmation email.
  • Pick a new date or hit cancel appointment.

* The full fee is charged for any cancellations or amendments less than 48hrs prior to the appointment or missing the appointment.

* If you are unable to see the calender below, please go to https://www.bookingbug.com/home/115399 click the icon below.

BOOK NOW
